text: @SpeakerPelosi @Morning_Joe It was your partisan impeachment for political gain that distracted both House and Senate from the coronavirus. The coconavirus briefing was held on the same day as the Senate had to submit their impeachment questions. Schiff didn't do a briefing until the impeachment failure.
